item.title: Welcome to my website
item.description: This site is going to help me document things that I could forget and it will be my personal reference, The site is dedicated to sysadmin and devops first and foremost. You will also find a great deal of automation, CI/CD, containerization, coding, and etc. Hope you enjoy this blog post.

item.title: About Devops.com.co
item.description: Hello Everybody üòé, My name is Hector Fabio Jimenez Saldarriaga you can call me h or Hector I’m from the beautifulüå† country of Colombia üåé, I’m Currently Infra Engineer at a local company and also student of Systems Engineering and Computer Science program at Universidad Tecnol√≥gica de Pereira. I do really enjoy Computer Systems and all related with electronics in general my main interests are Computer Security, Network Security, System Administration and DevOps, I usually use Unix,Gnu/Linux Enviroments (Currently trying to understand Windows Environments) and program in Python/Javascript languages.
